sql.where:
status != 'd'
and ( pn like concat('%',#{_SH},'%') or name like concat('%',#{_SH},'%') )
and brand = #{brand}
and pn like concat('%', #{pn}, '%')
and exists (select 1 from MM_GOODS_COMB where MM_GOODS_COMB.goods_id = #{goodsId} and MM_GOODS_COMB.item_id = WM_ITEM.id)
and pn = #{goodsCode}
and barcode like concat('%', #{barcode}, '%')
and exists (select 1 from MM_CATEGORY_GOODS where MM_GOODS.goods_id = MM_CATEGORY_GOODS.goods_id and category_id = #{category})
and name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
